sentences.en: A large plate came skimming out , straight at the footman's head.
sentences.cn: 一只大盘子直向听差的脑袋飞来.

sentences.en: A swallow flew west skimming the lake.
sentences.cn: 一只燕子掠过湖面往西飞.

sentences.en: Bill pushed us off and we went skimming away from the shore.
sentences.cn: 比尔把我们的船撑开,我们就滑离了海岸.

sentences.en: Frequent skimming or improper skimming can cause a much higher dross loss.
sentences.cn: 撇渣过频或操作不当会使浮渣损失很大.

sentences.en: He has been accused of skimming the cream off the economy.
sentences.cn: 他被控从经济中捞取了丰厚的油水。

sentences.en: It'shot forward like some flying fish, hardly skimming the water.
sentences.cn: 小船活像离开了水皮的一条打跳的梭鱼.

sentences.en: Rough seas today prevented specially equipped ships from skimming oil off the water's surface.
sentences.cn: 今天汹涌的海浪使特别装备的船只无法撇去浮在水面上的石油。

sentences.en: Rough seas today prevented specially equipped ships from skimming oil off the water'ssurface.
sentences.cn: 今天海面上风浪很大，那些配有专门设备的船只无法展开清除海面浮油的工作。

sentences.en: The book is worth skimming through.
The little boat was skimming across the sunlit surface of the bay.
sentences.cn: 一叶小舟正轻轻掠过阳光下的海湾。

sentences.en: The plane flew low, nearly skimming the sea.
sentences.cn: 飞机低飞, 掠过海面.

sentences.en: The swallows were skimming the water.
They heeled the sloop well over, skimming her along to windward.
sentences.cn: 他们使单桅小船倾斜适当, 使它顶着风向前滑去.

sentences.en: They heeled the sloop well over, skimming it along to windward.
sentences.cn: 他们使单桅小船倾斜适当, 让它顶着风向前滑去.

words.tran_cn: 脱脂的；撇去浮沫的；表层的
撇；撇去的东西；表层物；瞒报所得的收入
漏杓；燕鸥类；大略阅读的人；撇去浮沫的器具
浏览，掠过；去除（skim的过去分词）
略读；撇去…的浮物；从…表面飞掠而过；去除；（为逃税而）隐瞒（部分收入）

trans.tran_cn: 撇取浮沫，所撇取的浮沫
撇去( skim的现在分词 )，掠过，轻轻擦过，略读
trans.tran_en: If you skim something from the surface of a liquid, you remove it
